identity.name: Xuru
identity.tagline: AI-powered support ticket CRM that answers first
identity.description: AI support agent that drafts every response using your knowledge base, learns from every resolved ticket, and works through your existing email. Agents respond from Gmail, Outlook, or any email client — no login to Xuru required. AI resolves 50%+ of tickets in 1-2 responses.

capabilities.summary: AI-first support ticket CRM designed for small teams that live in email. The AI drafts contextual responses using a self-improving knowledge base seeded from your documentation. Agents respond directly from their email client via IMAP/SMTP integration — no dashboard login required. Ticket codes in subject lines keep everything threaded automatically. Supports pool, round-robin, category-based, and least-loaded ticket assignment.
solves: support tickets pile up because my team is too small to respond quickly
I need a help desk but my team won't log into another dashboard
auto-responses are generic and useless, I need real answers
I want AI to draft support responses using our actual knowledge base
Zendesk and Freshdesk are too expensive for my small team
I need a CRM that works through email, not alongside it
ideal_for: teams that primarily communicate via email
companies that want AI-first support without enterprise pricing
web hosting companies, MSPs, and service providers
startups that need support tooling without the overhead
differentiators: AI drafts first response — not bolted on, built around AI from day one
Email-native: agents never need to log in, respond from any email client
Self-improving knowledge base learns from every resolved ticket
$5/seat/month with unlimited tickets — fraction of incumbent pricing
